phrases: On the night of Christmas Eve,
I made up with Shiina,
and passed the Let us Make a Game proposal screening.
If things had gone well between Jin-san and Misaki-senpai,
it would have been the perfect Christmas Eve.
But...
So, how did it turn out like this?
Idiot.
Hey, Shiina, you remember what I said, right?
Chihiro-sensei's going on vacation to Australia over winter break,
so we cannot stay in Sakura Hall.
I know.
Then, why have not you asked Rita to come get you?
You realize we are all going home, do not you?
Aoyama-san, do not tell me you...
I-It is not like that!
My head's been full of other thoughts,
and I completely forgot about going home.
I am sorry, I am sorry, I am really sorry.
Forgetting that is a huge problem!
I cannot go home anyway, so I am sorry...
S-So, what about you, Misaki-senpai?
I do not want to go home.
My hometown's full of memories of me and Jin.
I do not want to go home.
Senpai...
In that case, you will all have to go stay at Kanda's place.
What?
S-Sensei, what are you saying?!
I am leaving this afternoon.
Make sure you are packed and ready to leave by then.
Sorata, strike while the iron's hot.
What?!
It is already been decided?
Komachi, this is a bullet train.
It is fast, is not it?
Whoosh!
I am glad we found people to take care of the other six.
Yeah, only Komachi was left behind.
Look, it goes 285 kilometers per hour!
Zoom!
Do you regret it?
Worrying about the past does not do any good.
I want to focus on the future.
That is some backwards optimism.
You can have this.
I prefer bamboo shoots...
I gave my last bamboo shoot to Nanami.
Sorry, I already ate it.
You rushed to eat that, did not you?
Misaki-senpai, do you want some mushrooms?
I like bamboo shoots.
Okay, that is enough!
I will eat all the mushrooms, okay?
We will shortly be arriving in Hakata.
Thank you for using the bullet train today.
What?!
Wh-Wh-What are all these people doing here?!
Uh, th-thanks for letting us stay with you...
I cannot do it!
I cannot stay at a boy's house!
You are saying that after coming this far?!
And there are even more sweet and fragile girls now!
Nice to meet you.
I am Kamiigusa Misaki.
Huh?
Um, nice to meet you.
She is right...
You must be the friends Sorata mentioned on the phone.
You are all such cute girls.
Huh?
What?!
I am the only one who did not know?
I thought it might be more fun that way.
Successful Surprise!!
Mom's teasing me!
Sorata, you are back.
Y-Yeah...
I am home.
I do not recall allowing you to be polygamous.
Not even the country's laws allow that!
Come on, everyone.
Dinner's ready.
Come on in.
E-Excuse us...
This will be a fun end to the year.
I think I understand how you adapted to life in Sakura Hall.
I am starting to feel the same way.
I wonder if Jin's had his dinner...
Did you suddenly get an urge to hear my voice?
That is exactly it.
That is nice of you to say.
Do you understand my situation?
I am currently in Fukuoka with everyone...
Chihiro-chan told me.
I respect you.
So, what do you want?
What happened between you...
and Misaki-senpai on the night of Christmas Eve?
I told Misaki I love her.
I confessed my love to Misaki.
Wh-What are you talking about?
If that is the case, why is Misaki-senpai...
I asked for more time because I love her.
Time?
College Entrance Examination Series
Osaka Art Schools
I am going to college in Osaka to chase my dreams.
Just because I love Misaki...
No, exactly because I am in love with Misaki,
I cannot become a worthless man who is abandoned his goals.
I want to move forward for once, too.
Let us Make a Game Rhythm Battler Vol. 1 Rhythm Action Battle Game Entry No. 06848860 Kanda Sorata
Well, there you have it.
Take care of Misaki for me for a while.
She will get jealous if I talk to you for too long, so I am hanging up.
Are you at one of your girlfriends' homes?
I broke up with them all.
I am staying with my friend, the Student Council President.
Who are you calling your friend?!
See you later.
What?!
Mitaka, you...
Hey, Student Council President...
That is former Student Council President.
Do you think I am wrong?
Yeah, you are wrong.
I see.
But you are also equally right.
I see.
Starting tomorrow, I will make dinner every night.
Every night?!
What do you want to eat?
Just get out of my house!
I am stuffed!
Motsunabe, chanpon, mentaiko...
That is a real Hakata dinner right there.
Thank you, Nanami-chan.
It is like Sorata found himself a bride.
What?!
Y-You think I could be Kanda-kun's bride?
What are you doing, Onii-chan?
Hey!
Sorata, do you want a wife?
You will have to defeat me before you can marry my brother!
Get off me.
Sorata, you are too close.
I cannot defeat Yuko like that.
Do not accept her challenge!
She is serious?!
In that case, I have to get into Suimei...
and face Mashiro-san in an all-out battle!
I will have to use my Plan C on Yuko.
No annihilating!
But, Yuko, your father is opposed to you taking the Suimei entrance exam.
I know!
That is why I need Onii-chan to convince
No.
Instant rejection?!
Convince him yourself.
I am busy during the break preparing for my presentation.
Presentation?
What is that?
Does it taste good?
Delicious!
I will never let you take the Suimei entrance exam.
I absolutely will not allow it!
That is final.
Oh dear.
Hey, Yuko-chan.
Do you want to start studying together tomorrow?
Huh?
If your father sees you studying hard, he might change his mind.
Aoyama...
What am I going to do, Onii-chan?!
Nanami-san's such a good person!
She is totally the one I need to keep my eye on!
What are you talking about?
Jin!
Did you finish writing the script?
Yeah, here.
Yeah!
Thanks, Jin!
Okay, I will start working on some layouts!
Sure.
Misaki?
In other words, I should not just focus on giving the presentation,
but also put myself in the shoes of the listener...
Presentation Techniques Lecture
Grab the attention of your listener!
That is right.
I believe it is important to include information...
the screening committee will find interesting.
I see.
Maid-chan, thanks.
If you are truly grateful, why do not you take a quick trip to England...
and take care of someone for me?
Sorry.
I do not do those kinds of jobs.
I look forward to hearing the results.
You mean the results of the presentation, right?!
Genre: Rhythm Action Game
Something interesting, huh?
Now I just have to figure out what that is...
Game Pitch Contents Fun Target Concept Benefits
Something the listener will find interesting?
How to play System Controls Appeal of the product?
I have written all the necessary points in my pitch document.
What else would the screening committee want to hear about?
Onii-chan, help me study!
Huh?
Where is Aoyama?
She went shopping with Mom.
So, while she is gone, teach me.
That is a lot of books...
This magazine...
I was thinking about reading it over my break.
You came here planning to take a break?
This is my oasis.
A manga I like is serialized in here.
It is written by someone called Shiina Mashiro-sensei.
The art's really beautiful.
Oh, but there are some weird characters.
These two.
Those are based on Jin-san and Misaki-senpai...
Their expressions of emotion leave something to be desired.
They will not get together, but they will not break up either.
Who knows what they really want?
No, no!
Honestly, I do not understand it.
Do not understand...
Now that I think of it, Mashiro-san, you have got the same name.
You are her?!
Yeah.
That is amazing!
I am a huge fan!
Can I have your autograph?
That was a major change of heart.
Yuko-chan, there you are!
Sorry for making you wait.
Let us work hard together!
Mashiro-sensei, I am cheering for you.
I look forward to next month's volume.
By the way, are you going to meet your deadline?
You will not be able to use a computer over the break...
I already did it.
What?
I gave it to Ayano.
I injured my finger.
I did it after it healed.
I see.
Is that right?
Huh?
Is that what you like about me?
Wha
Since then, I have liked that about you.
Answer me.
Y-Yeah, that is right.
Good.
What?
Is this for my presentation?
Use your abilities by hitting the buttons in time with the rhythm!
Use combos to score lots of points!
Will you stop liking me if I draw things that are not manga?
I-I will not!
Good.
I have got to work hard.
No, really...
Thanks.
This concludes my pitch.
Thank you very much.
That was amazing, Onii-chan!
You have become a truly competent man!
Yeah, it is gotten a lot easier to understand.
Sorata, you have grown so much.
That was so cool!
I want to hear it again!
Aoyama, did you make these?
I thought Mom did.
She used to make them for me all the time.
Y-Yeah, she taught me.
Are they good?
Yeah.
They are great, thanks.
I-I see.
That is good.
You are so focused on your work, you do not even eat dinner.
It is already New Year's Eve.
The presentation's right after the break,
but it took a while for it to take shape.
It was really good.
But I still feel a little uneasy.
Aoyama, if you were on the screening committee,
what would you want to hear during a presentation?
Who, me?
I do not know much about games, but...
Let us see...
If I worked for a company,
I might wonder if a game would make money or not.
Sorry.
That might be obvious.
No, I was so caught up in whether it would be fun or not,
I had completely forgotten about that!
That is amazing!
Thanks, Aoyama!
You are always helping me out, Aoyama.
You made me rice balls for my first presentation, remember?
Thanks for everything.
And you have got an audition coming up.
Sorry for being a burden.
No, it is okay.
I am doing this because I want to.
Besides, doing other things takes my mind off of it.
The only thing I can do until the script arrives is prepare myself mentally...
Aoyama...
Oh, yeah...
Once my script gets here, I will get you to help me practice for my audition.
Here.
You do not have to do that.
I would help you in any way I can.
What?
Why?
W-Well, because I want you to pass your audition.
I have been watching you work hard since we were first years.
But the truth is, I might just actually want you to prove...
hard work is always rewarded.
Sorry, I should not have said that.
No, it is fine.
Let us both work hard.
Yeah.
I will work hard, too.
I want to work hard with you.
Shiina, you always work hard.
I-I think so, too...
There have been lots of things I do not understand lately.
It is nothing.
Shiina?
There are lots of things I do not understand.
Mashiron?
Misaki, how do you want things to go with Jin?
Who knows what you want?
No, no.
Huh?
What does that mean?
In my manga, you are together.
Is that wrong?
What is right?
What is...
I want to be with Jin.
If I were hurting Jin by making animations, I would stop animating...
I see.
Would Jin like you if you did that?
Sorata likes that I love to draw manga.
What does Jin like about you?
Do you have enough chopsticks on that side?
Yeah, um...
Hey, do you have a minute?
I have never seen her study so hard.
But Dad opposes her applying to Suimei.
If you talked to Dad, he would allow it in an instant.
But Yuko asked you to do it.
Fine.
Tell Dad...
that I need to talk to him when he has a moment.
Okay.
Come on.
Your noodles will get soggy.
I know what I told Mom, but...
How am I supposed to convince Dad?
Opportunity waits for no man!
What is wrong with you?!
What are you doing?!
If you make excuses by saying you are not ready...
and let opportunities pass you by,
you will never get another chance!
D-D-Do not get so close!
N-N-No!
You wanted to talk to me, right?
Your mother told me.
What?!
That is why you came in here?!
Spit it out.
I wish you would waited until I got out of the bath.
There is one thing I need to teach you...
about life while I still have breath in my body!
Opportunity waits for no man!
I got it already!
I wanted to talk about Yuko!
She seems to be taking studying seriously,
so cannot you at least let her apply to Suimei?
If she tries and fails, Yuko will accept that, will not she?
Then, if she ends up attending a school here, will not that put your mind at ease?
You have grown, a little.
Hey!
Who are you talking to?!
My son.
Please just die already!
So, which girl are you serious about?
You just do not give up, do you?!
Why are you asking me questions like we are kids at a sleepover?
You should not be so indecisive!
I do not remember raising such a girly-ass son!
Can you just stop now?!
But it is your life.
Live it how you want to.
If you intend to go to college, do not worry.
I will make enough money to pay for your and Yuko's tuition.
I will not say it again.
Dad.
Well, in Yuko's case, it is probably...
impossible for her to get into Suimei.
I think so, too.
Hey, Sorata.
What?
I stayed in too long, and now I cannot move.
Help me.
Apologize first!
Apologize for making me think you were even a little cool!
It was probably a mistake to drink.
Do not get into the bath drunk!
Do not be stupid.
What man could talk to his own son sober?
You are the girly-ass!
Sorata...
There is more?!
Happy New Year.
I am not in any mood to celebrate the new year!
Staying up to watch the sunrise is a bit over-the-top for a New Year's celebration.
And the man who suggested it passed out.
What does Jin love about me?
Onii-chan, thanks for talking to Dad.
It sounded like he would have allowed it even if I had not said anything.
Yeah, but thanks anyway.
I am glad you are my brother.
Wh-What is that supposed to mean?
Mashiron, thank you.
I cannot stop animating.
I just end up doing it.
Even now, I want to go back to Sakura Hall and make more.
My head's full of thoughts of background animations for this shot,
and original screen splashes of that character!
Jin said he liked that about me!
I like you the way you always are, too.
S-So do I!
Me, too!
Yeah!
I love myself, too!
Sorry for making you all worry!
But I am okay!
Misaki-senpai.
I will make Jin's anime!
Using the script Jin wrote, I will make an animation myself!
Let us do this!
I will make Jin look at me this time!
I will make my presentation a success!
I-I will pass my audition!
Huh?
Oh!
I will get into Suimei!
Meatball beam, meow!
Do not use your special ability!
I like meatballs.
I hope Jin gets accepted.
All right!
Let us sprint towards the rising sun!
Misaki-san, there is a cliff over there!
Let us shout Geronimo and take the plunge!
Is she a monster?!
A paratrooper?!
A superhero?!
This girl's just plain weird!
The three days after Misaki-senpai's revival flew by...
And the day came for us to return to Sakura Hall.
Onii-chan, I will be coming next month for the entrance exam!
Kashiwameshi Bento
Our winter break's finally over.
Yeah.
Are you nervous?
Are you?
Things are just getting started.
Yeah.
I will have to face that nervousness again...
But this time, I am even looking forward to it.
Both of us living together.
It is my job to make dinner.
She stuffs her face with my potato and onion miso soup.
Every time I see that smile, I...
